FuncDef: The display inof configuration zone command displays the iNOF zone configuration on the device. The display inof configuration zone command displays the iNOF zone configuration on the device. This command is supported only on the CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P and CE8850-HAM.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an iNOF customized zone.
The value is a string of 1 to 63 case-sensitive characters.

Specifies the configuration of zones configured on only one reflector.
-

Examples: <HUAWEI> display inof configuration zone zone2 inconsistent
ExtraInfo: You can run this command to check the iNOF zone configuration on the device.
